name: OSOK (One Shot One Kill) - Desmadroso
additionalNotes: Edgar Hoill OSOK Cigars are part of the Edgar Hoill’s personal line of cigars created in collaboration with Christian Eiroa, the name behind Camacho Cigars. Together they crafted a blend that could justify Edgar Hoill’s reputation as the “One Shot One Kill” photographer. OSOK Cigars are full bodied premium handmade cigars made with Nicaraguan tobaccos leaves as filler, binder and wrapper. They offer a complex, balanced flavorful smoke with hints spiciness and rich nuances. Edgar Hoill OSOK Cigars come in unique shapes that further adds to their charm.
